feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.5: Fix QR Code Dark Mode Display
entry.content:
Thanks to the anonymous tipster via the feedback form!

:memo: What’s Changed

  • QR Code: Support for Dark Mode (#2064) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.914.0 to 1.915.0 (#2062) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump reviewdog/action-brakeman from 2.8.0 to 2.9.0 (#2061) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.40.5

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Configuration Documentation
  • API Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.8: Fix for URL View Tracking & Expiration
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Fix: URL View Tracking (#2084) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.147.0 to 1.148.0 (#2088) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.79.0 to 1.80.0 (#2087) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-cloud-storage from 1.50.0 to 1.51.0 (#2089) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.192.1 to 3.193.0 (#2086) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.919.0 to 1.920.0 (#2085) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.918.0 to 1.919.0 (#2080) @dependabot

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.40.9: Update Ruby Version & Fix Copyright [Broken]
entry.content:
This release produced a broken container version 1.40.9. Please use 1.40.10 instead.

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Footer: Fix Copyright Year (#2083) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Update Docker container to Ruby 3.3.1 (#2091) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.40.9
